meanings.definition: The main artery of the body, supplying oxygenated blood to the circulatory system.
meanings.sent1: The aortas carry oxygenated blood to all parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the aortas to understand how blood flows in the body.
meanings.sent3: The aortas decided to take a detour through the lungs for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like aortas, reaching everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The aortas, like mighty rivers, bring life-giving blood to every corner of the body.
